title: Adv. Configuration
text: a field name explanation alwaysprintsignaturereceiptifitemisreturned default = 1 if there is at least one return line on the receipt, a signature receipt is printed. 0=only signature receipt if negative total 1=signature receipt if min. one negative line. askforcustomerinfo 0 = default collecting information to external crm system. data can be downloaded from peoplecollector.dddadmin.com 0 = don’t ask for customer information 1 = ask for costumer information askforforegingiftcertificateinfo 0 = default when redeeming old gift vouchers, you can state the number of the old gift voucher. there will be a file in the pos folder called foreighngift.txt containing date,number,amount. made for björn borg in sweden. 0 = don’t ask for gift voucher number 1 = ask for gift voucher number askforreturncode 0 = default give a returnreason. the code must for now be given by a script directly in the database. the return reasoncode will be accessible in ddd report in q3 2013 0 = don’t ask for return reason 1 = ask for return reason austriafiscalpassword only in use in austria password is received from 3. party austriafiscalurl only in use in austria url is received from 3. party austriafiscaluser only in use in austria user is received from 3. party autohidechart 0 = default the graph on the log-on screen is visible or not after restart 0 = the graph is visible but can be hidden. 1 = the graph is not visible but can be opened 2 = the graph is not visible and can not be opend autoshowsalesreport 1 = default the salesreport is printed together with the evening balance report. 0 = is not printed 1 = is printed avalarakey is used in usa to fetch vat/tax according to the costumers zip code. key is received from 3. party b field name explanation backofficetype 1 = default 1 = ddd bo 2 = chess barcodesearchvariantparameter 0 = default old barcode numbers can be placed in a variant parameter and will be read from here when scanned on the pos. the value states the variant parameter number (1-5) 0 = not in use barcodetype ean = default ean, itf14, itf18 bertonizeex blockitemgroupfrom default = 9911 from group where manual sale is not possible blockitemgroupto default = 9914 to group where manual sale is not possible c field name explanation changecode default = guldmønter exchange code. is used on the exchange receipt and the exchange label. must be 10 different characters e.g. a word with 10 different letters (regulation cumberland, springvale, pathfinder, monkeyspit, motherland, crazywomen falconview, beachfront duckmaster, bankruptcy, authorized, republican, educations, lumberjack) changelabelline1 first line on the change label. select the parameter to be printed in the first line of the change label. values: parameter1 parameter2 parameter3 parameter4 parameter5 variant1 variant2 variant3 variant4 variant5 changelabelline2 second line on the change label. select the parameter to be printed in the first line of the change label. values: parameter1 parameter2 parameter3 parameter4 parameter5 variant1 variant2 variant3 variant4 variant5 changelabelinsteadofnote default=0 indicates if the exchange note button on the sales layer prints a note or a label. 0 = change note 1 = change label changenotefixeddate fixed exchange date (*) changenotetype 2 = default exchanage note type. used on the exchange note button on the sales layer. 0 = x number of day from today (**) 1 = fixed exchange date (*) 2 = x number of days from a chosen date (**) changenotevariabledate number of days from today or from the chosen date that will be printed as the exchange date on exchange notes or –labels. ** chartisinclusivegiftandcredit not in use. the graph is showing the sale up to the group stated as the last group with sale in supporttools checkclientidongiftcertificates checking if the gift certificate or credit note is issued in the same concern (group) as the one it is redeemed in. 0 = no check (default) 1 = check cleancashposid only in use in sweden clickandcollect default=0 if the costumer uses click&collect with their webshop. 0 = not in use 1 = old click&collect 2 = weborder clickandcollectstock id of the webshop client in bo (webshop stock) only in use, if clickandcollect = 1 clubmatasparterid not in use cphearnandburnburnlimit default = 7500 only in use in dk cphearnandburnoperator only in use in dk cphearnandburnshopid only in use in dk cphearnandburnusername only in use in dk cphearnandburnuserpassword only in use in dk customerscreenblanktimer 30 = default number of seconds until the latest receipt is cleared from the customer screen. customerscreenenabled 0 = default use customer screen 0 = customer screen not in use 1 = 1024*768 2 = 800*600 (standard) 3 = 1024x customerscreenfonttype tahoma = default the font used on the customer screen. must be a font present in windows/fonts customerscreenmarqueebuttom marquee in the bottom of the screen. the start point of the text depends on the length of the text. use “space” customerscreenmarqueetop marquee in the top of the screen. the start point of the text depends on the length of the text. use “space” customerscreenonlyurlscreen only browser on the customer screen. no texts and no receipt copy. customerscreenpicturebuttom picture in the bottom of the screen. type the local path to the picture file. picture is always centered. customerscreenpicturebuttomalignment the placing of the bottom text l=left r=right c=center blank=center customerscreenpicturetop picture at the top of the screen. type the local path to the picture file. picture is always centered. customerscreenpicturetopalignment the placing of the top picture l=left r=right c=center blank=center customerscreentextbutton fixed text in the bottom of the screen. # will break the line. font is taken from customerscreenfonttype customerscreentextbuttomalignment the placing of the bottom text l=left r=right c=center blank=center customerscreentexttop fixed text in the top of the screen # will break the line font is taken from customerscreenfonttype customerscreentexttopalignment the placing of the top text l = left r = right c = center blank = center customerscreenurl enter the url to the page you want to display on the customer screen. it can also be a local path. a power point presentation must be in the mhtml (.mht) format. customerscreenzoomfactor must be 70 when a 1024*768 presentation is chosen in the standard setup of customerscreenenabled. when using a .mht file the setup is automatically done. cvrnumber the vat number that is printed on the receipt and on the evening balance report d field name explanation dddidentifier the client number the pos is connected to. dddloyaltychainid loyalty id loyalty 1 = chain id loyalty 2 = club id chain id is found by the loyaltycreator club id is found by the portal/support dddloyaltypassword only loyalty 1 must be known or found in the database by maintenance dddloyaltytype 0=loyalty 1 1=loyalty 2 dddloyaltyurl default = http:loyalty.dddadmin.dk only loyalty 1 dddloyaltyusername only loyalty 1 username is found by the loyaltycreator dddposinfourl do not change differencegroup do not change. only in use when backoffice type is 2 (chess) e field name explanation ekvitteringftppassword do not change: information comes from e-kvittering if used by customer (only in dk) ekvitteringftpuser information comes from e-kvittering if used by customer (only in dk) ekvitteringstorekey information comes from e-kvittering if used by customer (only in dk) employeesalepassword password used on the staff sale button eveningbalancegroup do not change f field name explanation financialreportonthereceiptprinter 0 = default print the evening balance report on the receipt printer instead of the a4 printer. 0 = a4 printer 1 = receipt printer fingerprintreader 0 = default 0 = fingerprint reader not in use 1 = fingerprint reader in use fiscaltype default = italy at the moment only in use in italy fixedpercentage1 fixed discount% on button 1 on the discount folder fixedpercentage2 fixed discount% on button 2 on the discount folder g field name explanation getbudgetfromwebservice get the budget file by web service. the file is placed on the ftp server and the job must be set up. format of the file: see wiki. getimagefromwcf get the picture file by web service. will look for the file locally first and then on the server. pictures are uploaded from dddadmin. catalog parameter must be set in getimagefromwcfparameter getimagefromwcfparameter the parameter whose content is compared with the name of the picture file. can also be an ean number. gfx not in use. must be 0 giftandcreditinturnover not in use. is taken from the last group with sale in support tools h field name explanation hidecashstatement default = 0 hide the result of the evening balance 0 = show 1 = hide hidechartvalues 0 = default hide the values in the graph on the log-on screen. 0 = show values 1 = hide values hideemployeenumberonnote 0 = default hide the employee number on the receipt. 0 = show number 1 = hide number hidegponlookup default = 0 0 = gp is shown in the traffic analysis lookup on pos 1 = gp is not shown in the traffic analysis lookup on pos hidereportshortcuts not in use i field name explanation inbankcashgroup do not change insertedcardgroup do not change l field name explanation language not in use. main language is set in pos/stores largeaccount retail in a box 0 = the retail in a box menu is not shown. 1 = the retail in a box menu is shown. lastitemgroupincludedinsale not in use. comes from support tools by web service m field name explanation maxcashstatementdiff 20 = default limit that makes the pos ask you if you are sure you can accept the difference in the evening balance. in local currency. mayflowerenable loyalty card in sweden mayflowerpassword comes from mayflower mayflowerrolecode comes from mayflower mayflowerurl comes from mayflower mayfloweruser comes from mayflower mobilepayapikey only in use in dk mobilepaybulkref only in use in dk mobilepaylocationid only in use in dk mobilepaymerchantid only in use in dk mobilepayposname only in use in dk mobilepayposunitid only in use in dk mobilepayreceipttext only in use in dk mobilepayurl only in use in dk morningbalancegroup do not change n field name explanation netsprepaiditemgroupnumber default = 9919 do not change only in use in dk o field name explanation opendraweronpersonaltransfer default = 0 0 = open drawer on staff sale 1 = don’t open the drawer on staff sale p field name explanation pbsprepaiditemnumber default = 9919 do not change only in use in dk personaltransferstock client number of the staff sale stock. the client must be created in backoffice and the auto-update must be activated by bo.dev.support pingurl default = www.dddadmin.com the url that is pinged to check the internet connection printerchars default = 42 number of signs on the printer. value must match with the printer setup. printonlyfirstnameonnote 1 = default 0 = print first and last name on the receipt 1 = print only first name on the receipt. printreceiptdialog 1 = default open a dialogue whether a receipt should be printed or not 0 = no 1 = yes printsmallheaderonchangelabels 1 = default 0 = print shop name and address from stores on exchange label. 1 = print only shop name on exchange label. 1 leaves space for logo on exchange label. r field name explanation r24certificate only in use in sweden r24url default should not be changed s field name explanation sagemdanskgebyr 0 = default only in use in dk sagemudlgebyr 0 = default only in use in dk salechartlocal 0 = use data from backoffice on the graph 1 = use data from the local pos on the graph 2 = uses “lastyear file” satellitelanguageversion blank = default the backoffice button in “extra information” calls backoffice in this language version blank: dk se no de uk sendcashstatementpayment default = 0 send payment type 109 to backoffice (evening balance). used in integration with erp showcostpriceonitem default = 0 the average cost price of the article is shown in the article information window. not in use if the article update is done by webservice. showdebtorbalanceonnote 0 = default show the balance on the debtor receipt. 0 = balance is not shown 1 = balance is shown showitemmanagementmenu 0 = default show the item management menu in the dddpos backoffice menu (the ddd button). this function is used if the shop is not a retail in a box, but wants to handle the items directly on the pos. 0 = don’t show the item management menu. 1 = show the item management menu. sixpaymentdeviceid only used in ch. values comes from 3. party sixpaymentipaddress only used in ch. values comes from 3. party staffsaleenabled enable “the new staff sale method”. automatic calculation of discount etc. see staffsalerate and staffsaletype. 0 = don’t use the new staff sale method (default) 1= use the new staff sale method straffsalerate the rate that is used in the calculation of staff sale. used in type 1 and 2 (see below). 10 = 10% 0 = default staffsaleenabled must be set at 1 to use this entry staffsaletype the type of staff sale. staffsaleenabled must be set at 1 to use this entry. 0 = costprice+vat (default) 1 = costprice+ straffsalerate+vat 2 = salesprice- straffsalerate storevisionactive default = 0 is the shop using store vision employee management system 0 = no 1 = yes storevision password comes from store vision storevisionurl dont change storevisionusernam comes from store vision swipppublickey swippsecretkey swippurl t field name explanation taxenabled us tax not in use taxinfourl us tax not in use terminalautoendofday used with ingenico card- terminal. only one terminal can make the autoend. if the shop has 2 or more tills, only one till must be set to make autoend. 0 = the card-terminal on this till will not do autoend of day 1 = the card-terminal on this till will do autoend of day (default) terminalnumber the pos number terminal type payment terminal type 1 =sagem dk 2 =sagem se 3 =sagem pospay no 4 =babs se (old) 5 =point xenta dk 6 =luottokunta fi 7 =point yomani dk 8 =bankterminal de 9 = pospay (no) 10 = nets viking terminal 11= treibauf pepper 12 = se babs 13 = sixt payment (ch) totaldiscountreason default = 0 use discount reason on total discount? 0 = no 1 = yes the same discount reason on all receipt lines u field name explanation updateurl url where the pos finds the updates. do not change useaustriafiscal default = 0 only in austria 1 = use usecleancash default = 0 the pos uses clean cash 1 = yes only in sweden usedddadmin the pos is using dddadmin be careful if you change this. it may cause problems. se wiki for further information. 0 = not using dddadmin 1 = using dddadmin usefiscalprinter default = 0 1 = use fiscal printer usenetsprepaidcards 0 = no 1 = yes usepbsgiftcertificate default = 0 the pos can issue pbs prepaid gift vouchers 1 = yes only in use in dk useprinter default = 1 use receipt printer? 0 = the pos is not using receipt printer 1 = the pos is using receipt printer useretain24 default = 0 the pos is using retail24 gift voucher 1 = yes only in use in sweden useterminal default = 1 the pos uses integrated card terminal 0 = no 1 = yes see also terminaltype useterminaldcc default = 0 customers can choose to pay in their own currency. only available on the point yomani terminal. 0 = no 1 = yes usetimeregonclerks default = 0 used with samesystem will show a button on the front page after logon. the button is used to register working hours. 0 = no 1 = yes usewebposparkall default = 0 1 = activates button on dddpos, so all parked notes on webpos’es can be fetched. if usewebposparkclerkno = 1, the clerk number from the webpos will be used on the sale in dddpos. if usewebposparkclerkno = 0, the clerk number from the dddpos will be used. usewebposparkclerk default = 0 1 = check for parked notes on webpos made by the on-logged clerk. usewebposparkclerkno see usewebposparkall usewebservices default = 1 is webservice used to transfer item information to the pos. 0 = no 1 = yes usewebservicesale default = 1 is webservice used to transfer sales information from the pos. 0 = no 1 = yes z field name explanation zipcodecheckinterval default = 20 how often are the customers asked for their zip-code. the number indicates the interval between customers asked. the number is reset every time the application re-starts. set to 9999 if you don’t want to use.

title: Error while retrieving reports-RIAB
text: in riab,reports can be ordered in the menu called reports as shown in the below screenshot. when a report is ordered,it should appear in the print out in a couple of seconds. sometime,there are errors and reports are not generated. in such case,restarting the pos can sometime resolve the problem. if the error is related to bad communication between servers(web server is not communicating with ftp server) so the customer will receive the following error. in such case,a ticket must be created for the development team so they can work on it. please note that the drift team must have information,which server the pos is communicating. this information can be found on the main interface of the pos as shown below. in the below case,the webserver is 13 and drift must have this information.
